# kernels(withMetalString:)

**Type Method**

Load kernels from a Metal language string.

## Declaration

```swift
class func kernels(withMetalString source: String) throws -> [CIKernel]
```

## Parameters

- **source**: A string containing the progam in Metal language.

## Return Value

An array of [doc://com.apple.coreimage/documentation/CoreImage/CIKernel] objects.

## Creating a Kernel Using Metal Shading Language

- **init(functionName:fromMetalLibraryData:)**: Creates a single kernel object using a Metal Shading Language (MSL) kernel function.
- **init(functionName:fromMetalLibraryData:outputPixelFormat:)**: Creates a single kernel object using a Metal Shading Language kernel function with optional pixel format.
- **kernelNames(fromMetalLibraryData:)**: Return an array of strings containing the names of all of the kernels contained in the Metal library.
